page.title: 17DIET SCHOOL MEALS, 1 WEEK
page.content: {MENU cont'd {Thursday, 1st course, Caterburgers (minced meat, name, 1st as in catering, 2nd, origin U.S.A.)60g Chipped potatoes 180g, Baked Beans 90g {2nd course, Orange Buns 60g, Milk Shake 200g. {Friday, 1st course, 2 Sausages (minced meat in skin tube 10cm long) 60g, Mashed potatoes 180g Baked Beans 90g. {2nd course,} Swiss Buns 60g, Orange juice 150g. Infant children, 5-7yrs, eat about 2/3 of these amounts. Older children usually have 2nd helpings of favourite dishes. For some pupils, this is the only meal of the day, for others the only main meal of the day, a small percentage eat another meal with parents in the evening. 1/3 of the pupils bring packed lunches from home.
